StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetO.cerReferralHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int AS
SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(11), C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, 106) AS CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME) + ', ' + RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS REFERRAL_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM OFFICER_REFERRAL R INNER JOIN NWA N ON (R.REFERRER_CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND R.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID) INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT C ON N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID ORDER BY C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE DESC
